resources.string: Youth of The Twenty First Century Organisation
Mutundwe Parish, Lubaga division Kabaawo zone P.O Box 7451

Youth of The Twenty First Century Organization (YOTTCO) is a community based organization in Mutundwe Parish of Lubaga Division established in March 2012 to empower vulnerable urban youth of different nationalities including refugee youth to become self-reliant and effectively participate in community development.The organization trains youth in relevant entrepreneurship skills to engage in gainful self-employment and live a meaningful life. The idea of YOTTCO was conceived by a group of three youth who were unemployed and wanted to find solutions the unemploymentproblemthrough practical entrepreneurship skills.
Enhancing Urban Refugee Youth Capacity to Secure, Protect and Respond to Sexual Gender Based Violence and Exploitation” in Makindye Division
YOTTCO is set to implement a project titled
“A society where youth are valued, respected and live a prosperous life”
“To create opportunities for vulnerable urban youth to develop trade, financial resource base and entrepreneurship skills to be self-reliant and healthy”.
YOTTCO is legally registered as a Community Based Organisation (CBO) by Kampala City Council Authority in August 2012 (LUB/12/320).YOTTCO is also registered as a company limited by guarantee.
Respect, Care, Integrity, Transparency and Professionalism.

1) To initiate income generating activities that will employ and improve welfare of youth. 2) To promote entrepreneurship skills development among youth. 3) To facilitate access to sexual reproductive health rights of young people. 4) To promote youth talents through sports, art, music dance and drama. 5) To facilitate access to youth friendly financial services. 6) To network and collaborate with development organizations with similar objectives.
